EmailTemplate.subject: September 20th Webinar: Maximizing Your Sweet-Billing Reports
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
September 20, 2011 Webinar Maximizing the Use of Your Sweet-Billing Reports
Please join us for the upcoming webinar: Maximizing the Use of Your Sweet-Billing Reports on Tuesday, September 20th at 2 pm Eastern Time (1 pm CT | Noon MT | 11 am PT).
Your Presenters: Larry Cole and Michele Duwe, TriTech's EMS Solutions Sales Team
In this upcoming webinar, you'll learn about:
Exporting basic reports out of Sweet-Billing Preparing ‘presentation quality’ charts and data in Excel Which Sweet-Billing daily reports should be used for productivity and efficiency input for your service The financial reporting capabilities of your Sweet-Billing program
Register Today: http://offers.tritech.com/MaximizingtheUseofYourSweetBillingReports_Sept_20_2011_Registration.html
Questions? Contact Cheri Lane, TriTech's Marketing Communication Manager 800-537-3927, ext. #6728 cheri.lane@tritech.com
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
